entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:47 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 33. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
